thread.section_title: Biz2Credit Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Biz2Credit | biz2credit.com
thread.title: Jeff Pauley

author: Jeff Pauley
title: Jeff Pauley
text: Rony has helped us several times in the past to get us the funding we need to run our small business, We are extremely satisfied with our service and will continue to use Biz2credit in the future when we need a little help. Both times we have turned to Rony we have been funded within 48 hours. No hidden fees. They tell you what you qualify for and then it is in your bank in record time.
